overview: Love blooms between Samantha (Amanda Baumann) and married man Chris (Edward F. Villaume), but trouble strikes when they are spotted together by Chris's mentally ill brother-in-law, Ted (Ryan Reyes), a graphic artist who likes to impersonate his own vigilante creation, the Hawk. Meanwhile, Chris's wife, Doris (Noel Thurman), is terrorized by a stalker when she takes her two kids on the run in this nail-biting thriller.
tagline: The truth shall set you free... if it doesn't kill you
title: Things You Don't Tell
